message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I'm offering you 40% and I'll take 60%.  We can both walk away happy.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think we can both do better. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor, reflecting my value in this negotiation. Let's be realistic and see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 55 and you can have 45.  Let's end this and avoid further losses due to inflation.
